Our Work

Our work speaks for itself

Experience World-class Agile Product Development

Join us on an exciting journey of innovation! With our top-notch Agile Product Development services, we turn your ideas into reality quickly and smoothly. Our team of experts works tirelessly to ensure every step is perfect, boosting efficiency and excellence along the way. Feel the power of agility and precision with our custom-made solutions, designed to take your business to new heights of success!

Our Development Process

As a leading Software Development Company, we follow agile development to develop top-notch software rapidly. This helps us adapt to changes quickly, get products to market faster, work better together, and keep improving through small steps.

We delve deep into understanding your needs, goals, and target audience to ensure our solutions align with your vision.

PROTOTYPING & MVP DEVELOPMENT

LAUNCH, MAINTENANCE, & SUPPORT

IT Services We Offer

As a leading software and mobile app development company, we employ the latest technologies and creative ways to deliver scalable, effective, and resilient solutions that drive business growth and success.

Everything Related to Software Development in One Place

At Codevian, we provide high-quality software solutions that are tailored to your specific requirements, assuring stability and security across every platform, OS, and browser.
  • Custom software development
  • Software consulting
  • Full-stack Development
  • MEAN & MERN Development
  • Software Product Development
  • Legacy software modernization
  • Application Development & Maintenance
  • Cloud application development
Learn More about Software services

Let’s Create Apps That People Love!

whether it’s a website, web app, or mobile app — our team of developers can craft all sorts of websites and applications that are compatible with any device. we will help you to make your dream project a reality!

  • Website Design & development
  • Web App Development
  • Mobile App Development
  • IOS Development
  • Android Development
  • Flutter Development
  • Xamarin Development
  • React Native Development

Make Your Users Fall in Love With Your Apps

Our talented pool of UI/UX developers are experts at enhancing user experiences to drive engagement. With years of experience under their belt, our team crafts intuitive and visually appealing interfaces that captivate your audience.

  • Persona Development
  • User Interface (UI) Design
  • User Experience (UX) Design
  • Wireframing and Prototyping
  • Usability Testing & Validation
  • Website & App redesigning
  • Responsive Designing

10x Your Output While Saving Costs!

With our team augmentation service, you can hire our skilled developers for your project and complete it faster. Easy onboarding, a talented pool of diverse developers who excel in the latest tools and technologies, and data confidentiality — you will get a lot of benefits while augmenting your team.
  • Flexible Engagement Models
  • Competent Developers
  • Quick and Easy Onboarding
  • Choose from a Pool of Niche-specific Developers
Hire our developers

Drive Excellence through Perfection

Whether you’re launching a new software or updating an existing one, our QA & testing assure flawless performance and reliability, allowing your company to offer error-free user experiences every time.

  • Functional Testing
  • Regression Testing
  • Performance Testing
  • Load Testing
  • Security Testing
  • Software & Mobile App Testing
  • API Testing
  • Test Automation
  • QA Consulting

Migrate and Keep Up-to-date

Our maintenance and migration services ensure smooth transitions, improved performance, and enhanced security, helping businesses stay agile and competitive in today’s digital world.
  • Application Maintenance & Support
  • Infrastructure Migration & Maintenance
  • Data Migration
  • Cloud Migration & Maintenance
  • Server & Platform Migration
  • Version Control System Migration
  • Continuous Monitoring and Support
  • Database Maintenance and Optimization

Bridge Development and Operations for Maximum Efficiency

With our DevOps service, we streamline your software development, boost teamwork, and encourage ongoing innovation. Our DevOps engineers are proficient in many tools and technologies like MS Azure, AWS, GCP, Jenkins, Apache, Amazon ECS, and more. 

  • CI/CD Implementation
  • IaC Development
  • DevOps Automation
  • Container Orchestration
  • Microservices
  • Platform as a service (Paas)
Explore more DevOps Services

360° Support for All Your IT Needs

Whether you’re just starting your business or want to scale your enterprise to the next level — our team of consultants will help you with all your IT needs.

  • Startup IT services
  • IT Consulting & Solutions
  • Data Analytics
  • Cyberseurity services
  • Infrastructure Services

Lead the AI revolution!

By using the latest advancements in AL & ML, our team will help your business to make data-driven decisions and implement AI in your business to stay ahead of the curve in today’s competitive landscape.

  • AI Development & Consulting
  • Machine Learning Model Development
  • AI Product Development
  • AI-powered Virtual Assistants & Chatbox
  • Facial Recognition
  • Predictive Maintenance Solutions
  • Natural Language Processing (NLP)
  • AI & ML Data Support and Optimization
  • AI Security & Design
  • AIOps Solutions

Strategic Partner and Clients

Our success is driven by our strategic partners, who help us provide personalized solutions that meet our clients’ demands.

Entire web development team attention to every detail of our design, layout, color pallet, branding, and presentation. Their communication and response time was excellent and they welcomed our input. Patiently heard all our concerns or recommendations. We continue to use Codevian for our future projects and we highly recommend them.

Michael (Mike) Lancey, President and CEO Mckenzie Chase Management

Codevian team is amazing. My project was fairly complicated and I never had to micromanage. Yogesh and his team communicated perfectly what I asked of them and provided work that was above what was expected. Worth every penny if you want your project done right the first time.

Carole Bacon, CEO at BullHead City web

This a great company. The pricing is great and they are smart, reliable and passionate. They offer great solutions to complicated problems. They are always available and very flexible.

Sujith Papali , Director at Hireseat LLP

A very professional and responsive approach to achieve customer goals. Developed Very high Quality BtoC Ecommerce app for our Bhaki Domian.

Dilip Joshi , Director at Hireseat LLP

The new tool helps the internal team save over two hours a day, meeting their expectations. Codevian Technologies Pvt. Ltd. provides a high level of customer service and support. The team is hard-working, creative, and dedicated.

Deepesh G , CEO at Mpos and Brooms

I have an excellent experience with Codevian’s delivery teams. They have good, established processes to deliver a high quality product. More importantly, whenever there’s any problem, the team is able to quickly respond and work towards the solution.

Vinay Darp , CEO at XtentTeam LLP

Industries We Serve​

We tailor solutions for your project’s success by assigning niche-specific developers with expertise in their domain.

Healthcare

Patient monitoring software development, telemedicine platform development, wearable health technology development, EHR software development and more.

Entertainment

Streaming platform development, virtual reality (VR) development, augmented reality (AR) development, social media development, and more

Real Estate

Property management software development, virtual reality property tours, real estate market analysis software development, real estate listing platform development and more

E-commerce

E-commerce platform development, CRM software development,  supply chain management development, E-commerce payment gateway development, and more.

Banking & Finance

Fintech app development, blockchain technology development, banking apps development, tax management software, and more.

Travel & Hospitality

Travel booking platform development, hotel management software development, travel itinerary planning software development, augmented reality tourism software development and more

Manufacturing

CAD software development, CAM software development, MRP software development, predictive maintenance software development and more

Logistics

WMS Software Development, TMS Software Development, fleet management software development, ERP system software development, and more.

It’s Time to Transform Your Development Process Today.

Find Your Ideal Engagement Model by Getting in Touch with Our Team. 

Read More

High Flexibility

FAQs

Got a question regarding Angular development? We’re happy to help.

Start today
What services does your company offer?
We specialize in software development, mobile app development, web app development, front-end development, back-end development, and staff augmentation services where you can hire our developers for your project needs. Needless to say, we can assist you in all stages of SDLC.
How much does it cost to develop a mobile app or web app or any software?
The cost of developing a mobile app, web app, or any program is determined by various aspects, including the functionality required, the supported platforms (web, mobile, desktop), and the kind of development (custom or platform-based). UI design intricacy, integration with additional systems, security, and performance needs all have an impact on cost. You can get an exact estimate by requesting a free project cost calculation from us.
How can you help startups?
We provide IT services for startups and help startups & small businesses with their IT needs. This includes Proof of Concept (POC) development, Minimum Viable Product (MVP) development, product design, IT consultation, and more.
How experienced is your team?
Our team comprises highly experienced professionals who specialize in their fields. They use the latest technologies and best practices to ensure timely delivery of your project They are also outstanding communicators, ensuring that your business’s demands are well understood.
Can we hire your resources for our projects?
Absolutely! We offer flexible engagement models where you can hire our talented developers for your project needs. Our developer pool includes experts in various technologies, such as Node.js, PHP, Python, .NET, Java, React.js, Angular, Vue.js, Drupal, WordPress, Django, CodeIgniter, Shopify, WooCommerce, and Salesforce.
Can we outsource our project to you?
Yes, you can outsource your project to us! We have a dedicated team of experts ready to handle your project efficiently. Just share your requirements with us, and we’ll take care of the rest, ensuring high-quality results and timely delivery.
